document_data.name: Kuketh
document_data.mainbody: '''Kuketh''' was a [[death slaad]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} [[Halaster Blackcloak]] summoned Kuketh and ordered it using its control gem to rule over a [[bullywug]] tribe inside the [[Slitherswamp]] level and fighting the [[naga]]s of [[Ssethian Scourges]].
document_data.Activities: When not bullying its subjects in the [[Blacktongue (tribe)|Blacktongue]] tribe, Kuketh used its time to quietly ruminate on its troubles.
document_data.Personality: Kuketh hated its situation and wanted only go back to [[Limbo]]. It was a mercurial creature and often changed its mind.
